ValidationRule.description: US-0007447 - Campaign Name validation rule - do not allow special characters
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(REGEX(Name, "^[_A-z0-9]*((-|\\s)*[_A-z0-9])*$")), OR( ISPICKVAL(EBH_Channel__c, "GCX Outreach (Phone)"), ISPICKVAL(EBH_Channel__c, "GCX Inbound (Phone)")), $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Campaign Name cannot contain special characters.
